name: Spathi's Determination
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
"Hey - hey you! Yeah, you! Fuck you!" - Spathi, probably
-
Requirements You must be wielding Spathi Anemou and there must be air.
Trigger An observed enemy in range of any *Spathi's Call*'s Wind Slice Strikes is caught flat-footed due to being airborne without a fly Speed
Use any of *Spathi's Call*'s Wind Slice Strikes to Strike the triggering enemy.
